title: The Polliwogs VivoCity Family Fun Activities
blurb: Lion dance blessing & chocolate taiyaki workshops!
description: Experience the vibrant energy of a lion dance blessing and bake adorable fish-shaped taiyakis filled with oozing chocolate. Assemble your own colourful fruit jelly parfaits. The Polliwogs VivoCity offers a range of engaging activities suitable for families and children of various ages. From interactive workshops to cultural experiences, there's something to spark joy and create lasting memories for everyone. Join us for a day of fun, learning, and bonding in a safe and welcoming environment designed to cater to the needs of both kids and parents alike. Enjoy a variety of play options.
